Title: Buen monitor con sonido lamentableGood monitor with regrettable sound
Review: Creo que el titulo lo dice todo.El monitor es c√≥modo, confortable, con buena resoluci√≥n, buena tasa de refresco, velocidad y color.El sonido es sencillamente LAMENTABLE.Vengo de un LG tambi√©n ultawide, y si bien el sonido no era de HiFi, era infinitamente mejor.Le pongo solo 4 estrellas por esto, porque para esa casta√±a de sonido, pod√≠an haberse ahorrado los altavoces.Lo que he hecho ha sido usar la salida de auriculares del propio monitor para conectar una barra de sonido de Trust, baratita, y la diferencia es como de la noche al d√≠a.Por lo dem√°s el monitor vale la pena.I think the title says it all. The monitor is comfortable, comfortable, with good resolution, good refresh rate, speed and color. The sound is simply REGRETTABLE. I also come from an LG ultawide, and although the sound wasn't HiFi, it was infinitely better. I give it only 4 stars for this, because for that chestnut of sound, the speakers could have been saved. What I did was use the headphone output of the monitor itself to connect a cheap Trust soundbar, and the difference is like from night to day. Otherwise the monitor is worth it.

Review: Desidero esprimere la mia soddisfazione per il servizio del venditore, che ha prontamente sostituito il monitor difettoso e ha coperto le spese di spedizione. √à importante comprendere che situazioni come queste possono verificarsi, e la gestione del problema √® stata impeccabile. Title: OSD non all‚Äôaltezza.OSD is not up to par.
Review: A parte il pesantissimo clouding dello schermo che lo rendono inusabile al buio (ed essendo un VA √® l'unico motivo per cui l'ho comprato), il motivo principale che mi fa lasciare una stella √® l'OSD che si ritrova. Ha pochissime impostazioni (tra cui la modifica dell'aspect ratio bloccata che su un 21:9 non √® il massimo, portando qualsiasi segnale diverso dal succitato ad essere deformato senza possibilit√† di un setup ad hoc), e indicazioni dei pulsanti a schermo che non coincidono con quelli fisici, portando a sbagliare spesso e volentieri nella navigazione. √à come se avessero usato l'OSD da un altro modello senza fare le dovute modifiche.Non ho neanche fatto i classici test con il calibro, per me √® inutilizzabile e molto limitato dal suo OSD, ho dovuto fare necessariamente il reso.Se invece cercate un monitor da collegare senza toccare nessuna impostazione se non quella della luminosit√†, potete farci un pensiero.Apart from the very heavy clouding of the screen that makes it unusable in the dark (and being a VA is the only reason I bought it), the main reason that makes me leave a star is the OSD that is found. It has very few settings (including the modification of the blocked aspect ratio, which is not the best on 21:9, leading any signal other than the one mentioned above to be deformed without the possibility of an ad hoc setup), and indications of the on-screen buttons that do not coincide with the physical ones, leading to errors often and willingly in navigation. It is as if they had used the OSD from another model without making the necessary changes. I haven't even done the classic tests with the caliber, for me it's unusable and very limited by its OSD, I necessarily had to do the return. If, on the other hand, you are looking for a monitor to connect without touching any setting other than the brightness setting, you can think about it.

Title: Monitor defectuosoDefective monitor
Review:
The media could not be loaded.
                
            
                
            
            
        
    
    








  
    Tiene un buen tama√±o pudiendo hacer las veces de dos monitores en paralelo. Muy c√≥modo para programar.Lamentablemente no lo he podido probar. Tras conectarlo al PC han empezado a salir l√≠neas verticales y horizontales en forma de ruido. He probado con otro cable que ten√≠a por casa y en ambos puertos HDMI con el mismo resultado.Al encenderlo y apagarlo (sin estar enchufado) tambi√©n aparec√≠an, por lo que se debe a un fallo del monitor, no de cables o conectores.He pedido la devoluci√≥n y no voy a volver a comprarlo. Me decantar√© por un monitor de otra marca aunque sea m√°s caro.It has a good size and can act as two monitors in parallel. Very convenient to program. Unfortunately I haven't been able to test it. After connecting it to the PC, vertical and horizontal lines started to appear in the form of noise. I tried another cable that I had around the house and on both HDMI ports with the same result. When it was turned on and off (without being plugged in) they also appeared, so it was due to a failure of the monitor, not of cables or connectors. I asked for a return and will not buy it again. I will opt for a monitor from another brand even if it is more expensive.
